channel.title: Resources on Facilitator Cards
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Facilitator Cards

item.title: Intro to the Facilitator Cards Blog
item.description: We’re going to be using this blog as a platform to talk about a few things: the creation of the Facilitator Cards, how we (and others, and you) are using them, and other facilitation & training resources we feel compelled to share. Beyond being a home to the cards themselves, our goal for this site is to serve as a gallery of related resources. Everything that falls into that bucket will be introduced on the blog.
